author: chfast
content: Ethereum Ethash DAG size has reached exactly 5GB. Are there any resources to watch the effect?

author: daniellehrner
content: I have checked several websites that display the hashrate, but i don't see any effect at all. It seems the amount of miners being affected by it was negligible.

author: chfast
content: In 4 days DAG size will be > 5GB.

author: _shemnon
content: The current dag epoch is 128 _bytes_ shy of 5 GiB.  (Gibibytes, binary, not decimal Gig).  Next epoch (15,390,000) will be 8MiB over 5 GiB
